item.title: [TEGA] Tega Industries Subsidiary to Invest Additional USD 35 Million in SG Company
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Tega Industries Ltd. announced that its wholly-owned subsidiary, Tega MC Investment Pte. Ltd., has exercised its Upsize Option and decided to increase its subscription amount by USD 35 million for additional investment in ordinary shares of SG Company. As a result, Tega HoldCo will now invest a total of USD 394,295,423 for a total of 394,295,423 ordinary shares of SG Company and hold ~84.2% of the total ordinary shareholding of the SG Company. Apollo HoldCo will invest a total of USD 74,107,477 for a total of 74,107,477 ordinary shares of SG Company and hold ~15.8% of the total ordinary shareholding of the SG Company. There will be no change to the amount of USD 270,00,000 to be invested by Apollo HoldCo in redeemable preference shares of RPS Company.

  • Tega Industries' subsidiary to invest an additional USD 35 million in SG Company
  • Tega HoldCo to invest a total of USD 394,295,423 in SG Company and hold ~84.2% of the total ordinary shareholding
  • Apollo HoldCo to invest a total of USD 74,107,477 in SG Company and hold ~15.8% of the total ordinary shareholding
  • No change in Apollo HoldCo's USD 270,00,000 investment in redeemable preference shares of RPS Company
  • Disclosure hosted on the Company's website: www.tegaindustries.com

item.title: [ADANIPOWER] Adani Power Responds to Exchange Over US Regulator's Summons to Adani Brothers
item.description:
Adani Power Limited has submitted a response to the clarification sought by the Exchange regarding a media report titled 'US regulator seeking measures to serve Gautam, Sagar Adani legal summons, Bloomberg reports'. The report, published on January 23, 2026, does not make any allegations against the Company, which is not a party to these proceedings. The Company's response reiterates their previous statement made on November 21, 2024, in response to a similar clarification. The content of the report does not trigger any disclosure requirements under Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI Listing Regulations.

  • Adani Power responds to clarification sought by the Exchange
  • No allegations made against the Company in the US regulator's proceedings
  • Company not a party to the proceedings
  • Response reiterates previous statement made on November 21, 2024

item.description:
